short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Installed by your IT Organization via UXM Desktop agent, monitors performance for selected websites, see options for urls monitored.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The UXM Web agent is a small JavaScript code that gathers metrics from the browser, data is send through the UXM Desktop agent to the UXM solution.

The Chrome extension allows SaaS solutions to be monitored.
Requires UXM Desktop agent version 2022.08.01.
